Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/South Shore
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses rrtd WB via Promontory Dr, South Shore Dr & 67th: EB via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette & Promontory Dr due to blockage nr 67th/South Shore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/South Shore due to street blockage near 67th/South Shore.

Westbound buses will operate via Promontory Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th including the normal route streets.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Jeffery, Marquette and Promontory Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Ohio
ShortDescription: NB 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago, Fairbanks and Illinois, due to street blockage near Michigan/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago, Fairbanks and Illinois, due to street blockage near Michigan/Ohio.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Ohio.
ShortDescription: NB 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago and Mies Van Der Rohe, due to street blockage near Michigan/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago and Mies Van Der Rohe, due to street blockage near Michigan/Ohio.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 130 Museum Campus Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Alder Planetarium
ShortDescription: SB 146 In Dr/Mchgn Exp & 130 Museum Campus are rrtd via Lynn White (await recovery time), Solidarity Dr, then their normal routes due to blockage nr Planetarium

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express and # 130 Museum Campus buses are temporarily rerouted via Lynn White (await recovery time), Solidarity Drive, then resume their normal routes due to street blockage near the Alder Planetarium.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Fulton
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Fulton, Desplaines, Milwaukee and Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Fulton, Desplaines, Milwaukee, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/Fulton.

Allow extra travel time.
